hint: A typical bilobed anther (stamen) bears four microsporangia (one per theca; two thecae per lobe). 18. Pollen products are available in the form of  A) Syrups B) Creams C) Tablets D) Energy shakes a) A and Cb) B and Dc) A and Dd) All of these Key: a
